Html:
I would like to play sounds on 32 channels independently in ASIO mode. Currently, only stereo output is supported on the first two ASIO channels.
Are there any plans to extend NAudio in this direction?

Thanks, Mathias Wellner


ETH Zurich, SMS Lab
http://www.sms.mavt.ethz.ch

hi Mathias,
it would be great to get NAudio working with multi-channel ASIO. We have a way to go first though, and only a very limited amount of test equipment.
Mark

Hi Mark,

I could do some testing with our sound card (Hammerfall DSP MADI), if that is of any help.

Mathias

thanks Mathias, the current ASIO implementation in NAudio was put together by Alexandre Mutel. I am hoping he might have time to trouble-shoot it a bit later this year, although I will do some experimenting of my own if I get the chance. I have a couple of Line 6 TonePort interfaces that don't work with it, so I am hopeful I will at least be able to get that working.

Mark
